sourcesContent:
import "./f.css" export default function F7() { return (

An easy way to be a good conversationalist

  • Be a good listener and encourage others to talk about themselves
  • Many people fail to listen attentively they are so much more concerned with what they are going to say next that they do not keep their ears open
  • If you want to know how to make people shun you and laugh at you behind your back and even despise you here is the recipe
  • Never listen to anyone for long, Talk incessantly about yourself, If you have an idea while the other person is talking donâ€™t wait for him to finish, Bust right in and interrupt at the middle of the sentence
  • Bad listeners are just bores intoxicated in their own ego and drunk with the sense of their own importance
  • If you aspire to be a good conversationalist be an active listener. To be interesting, be interested. Ask questions the other person will love answering
  • Remember that the people you are talking to are a hundred times more interested in themselves and their wants and problems than they are in you and your problems
) }
